Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Mido's house#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# holds #a Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.
